main.bio: Proficient in React.js for developing dynamic, user-friendly interfaces, and skilled in Node.js and JavaScript for building efficient and high-performing server-side applications. Experienced in designing and integrating RESTful APIs, ensuring smooth communication between client and server systems. Strong background in backend development, with expertise in MongoDB and relational database management and enabling robust data modeling.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
